snippet: Citing “new information,” Little League International officials met to discuss whether last summer’s World Series team from Chicago added top suburban players in violation of residency rules.
abstract: Little League International officials meet to discuss potential violations by the Jackie Robinson West team, Little League World Series national championships in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Citing “new information,” Little League International officials met to discuss whether last summer’s World Series team from Chicago added top suburban players in violation of residency rules.

headline.main: Eligibility Issue Raised Regarding Little League Team
